Class TradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.xpertsapp.model.TradeManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver

    public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver
    Manages loaded trades to prevent circular loading

      • getTrade

        public Trade getTrade(java.lang.String id)
        Return the found trade, always find online first, only if no internet cache will be loaded
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the trade or null if not found

        Parameters:

        isCounter - if its a counter offer or not
        Returns:
